text: This is a sample text chunk for continued pretraining. The model will learn to predict all tokens in this sequence. Domain-specific content helps adapt the model to your use case.
Another text chunk demonstrating the midtrain format. Unlike SFT which only trains on assistant responses, midtrain trains on every token in your text data.
You can include technical documentation, code snippets, research papers, or any domain-specific text that you want the model to learn from.
